name: Cigar Dagger - Royal Blood Robusto
additionalNotes: Cigar Dagger™️, founded in 2019 by a group of Los Angeles-based artists and cigar enthusiasts, revolutionized the cigar accessories industry with their exquisitely designed cigar nubbers. By incorporating intricate heads into their designs, they transformed the humble nubber into unique objets d’art that reflect the personality of their owners. Handcrafted using premium materials, Cigar Dagger pieces are made to exacting standards for enduring quality. Their global following and endorsements from notable figures attest to their position as the premier destination for exceptional cigar nubbers and accessories, including cutters, ashtrays, EDC items, and more.
